revision.text: '''Iapapa''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 25, but no more than 80 points of sour and less than 5 points of all other flavours. The [[Aspear]] berry must be unlocked to obtain this berry.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
